title: WiFi/Bluetooth Antenna
description: Both the Meadow F7 Feather development board and Core-Compute Module have an onboard ceramic chip antenna and a U.FL connector for an external antenna for the 2.4GHz WiFi and Bluetooth radio. Additionally, there is a software antenna switch for toggling between the two antenna; by default, the chip antenna is selected, and you must use the Meadow.OS device API to switch to the external antenna.

frontMatter.title: WiFi/Bluetooth Antenna
frontMatter.subtitle: Understanding and switching between the onboard and external antenna options.
